thread.section_title: Citadines Tour Eiffel Paris - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great view and location
thread.title_full: Great view and location - Review of Citadines Tour Eiffel Paris, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Zhichao M
title: Great view and location
text: Great view from our upgraded room. The location is excellent with three major train lines right at front, and yet quiet in the room. General condition is good and room is decent sized. We spent a good week here, they provide complimentary cleaning every 3 days of 6 days of staying, which is a bit interesting. (It's good for Environment to do less cleaning, Alright :) ) There some good cafe and decent restaurants around make our stay much pleasant.
